question: The motif of 'Hampi with Chariot' is printed on the reverse of which currency notes?
explanation: The new 50 rupees banknote from India is in a bright turquoise colour. On the obverse side of the Rs.50 note is a portrait of Mahatmi Gandhi, India's independence movement leader. On the reverse side of the â‚¹50 bill is an image of the stone chariot in the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Hampi.
